summary.summary_text: This is the last meeting of the company. They are going to have a prototype presentation, do an evaluation, go through the finance and see if they fall within the budget, do the evaluation and then make changes to the remote. They decided on the colour yellow, the principle of fruit, the materials for the case, the different energy sources and chips.
